title: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Program for Student-Centered Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Secondary-Level Mathematics Curriculum Content and Basic Educational Methodologies
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers develop competencies in designing and operating student-centered learning environments, emphasizing collaborative learning experiences using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core principles of student-centered learning environments (SCLE).
Learners can design and implement two types of student-led inquiry activities within the math curriculum.
Learners can suggest at least three personalized feedback strategies that account for individual learners' belief differences.
Learners can simulate project-based assessment designs using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
